spCCA 0.1.6
  • Get started
  • Reference

    cluster weight vectors by assigning them to one pattern The addPattern function clusters weight vectors by assigning them to one pattern in the given list. It checks if the mean cluster vector is similar to a new z.vector, and makes a new cluster if not similar to any existing cluster, counts the number of vectors associated with one cluster, and saves the correlation for the cluster. The function returns the updated list of patterns.

    addPattern.Rd

    The addPattern function is called within the get.best.lambdas

    addPattern(List.Pattern, corr, xyz.vector, z.vector)

    Arguments

    List.Pattern

    The list of existing patterns.

    corr

    (STN: LLM says:) The correlation value.

    xyz.vector

    (STN: LLM says:) The combined vector of x, y, and z-weight.

    z.vector

    The vector for comparison to find or create clusters

    Value

    List of cluster items: item [[1]]: correlation item [[2]]: combined vector of x, y, and z-weight item [[3]]: counter for number of vectors in cluster

    Contents

    Developed by Steffen Neumann.
